short_description_localized.en: Enjoy contemporary New York City style and flair. These elegant suites have accessible features and 465-562 square feet of modern comfort.
short_description_localized.es: Enjoy contemporary New York City style and flair. These elegant suites have accessible features and 465-562 square feet of modern comfort.

description_localized.en:
Enjoy an extraordinary stay in our Accessible City Lights Suite. With contemporary decor, you’ll experience the chic New York City style you would expect of a boutique hotel. 

Spread out and relax in 465-562 square feet of comfortable, accessible living space. Located on the second floor, these well appointed accommodations have an entrance door and bathroom door width of greater than 32”, a kitchenette, contemporary decor and first-class amenities.
description_localized.es:
Enjoy an extraordinary stay in our Accessible City Lights Suite. With contemporary decor, you’ll experience the chic New York City style you would expect of a boutique hotel. 

Spread out and relax in 465-562 square feet of comfortable, accessible living space. Located on the second floor, these well appointed accommodations have an entrance door and bathroom door width of greater than 32”, a kitchenette, contemporary decor and first-class amenities.

images.name: Handicap-Accessible-City-Lights-Suite--City-Lights-Bedroom
images.caption: City Lights Bedroom
images.description: This suite includes a king size bed and large window.
images.alt: A king sized bed to the right of a large window. There is light fixture in between and room amenity tray on the bed.
